website_summaries.verdict: Offers a nutritionally complete recipe and more food for the price, though it lacks some of the qualities of other formulas.
pros: Wholesome ingredients that include a variety of proteins, fruits, and vegetables
Formulated for all life stages, from puppies to seniors
cons: It's not grain-free, but the upside is no artificial ingredients plus more kibble for a lower price
Some frequent users think the formula has recently changed and is not as appealing as past bags

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!! I am livid!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 dogs that eat this food and have been for years. Recently all of them have developed severe bloody diarrhea!! I did a little research and it seems as though there has been an (unannounced) recipe change. I am so upset. Now I need to find a completely different food for them as I refuse to continue to feed them something that gives them severe diarrhea to the point of bleeding! Shame on you Natural Balance for caring more about the dollar than your customers. My poor pups now need to adjust to a new diet with an already inflamed digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Sellis207

customer_reviews.title: Seriously concerned
customer_reviews.text: I’ve fed my dog this for the last 12 years with no issues. Since I received this new bag she has been VIOLENTLY ill. Uncontrollable diarrhea!! I am worried about a recall or some contamination in a warehouse? According to the website there is no recall.....anyone else having issues. My dog gets zero table scraps or treats, 3 days now, if not better tomorrow we go to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We have two older dachshunds and I wanted to find a better dry dog food for them. After reading some of these reviews I decided to give this one a try. I was not disappointed. Their coats are shinier and so soft, one had some skin problems on his belly and it almost completely healed up from switching foods. This does have a rather icky smell to it, depending on how you store it. We have made sure the bag stays shut since it's in our pantry. Other than that minor issue this is by far the best dry dog food we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Thanks so much for the discontinuation notice Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this for 5 years. He has various allergies and we tried several different foods and discovered that this one agreed with him and he's thrived. Well, his supply is running low and I just NOW discovered that's it's been discontinued! We've been buying this thru Amazon for the entire 5 years. A little notice would have been nice so he could have slowly transitioned to a different food. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Winter

customer_reviews.title: The best dog food. Happy pup loves it and her coat is always shiny and soft.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this food since she was 4 months old (she is nearly 5 now) and is very healthy. This food was the first one that was able to make my parent's dog reach a healthy weight. They tried many brands before I introduced them to this one and they have not gone back. That said, make sure you are very careful how much to give your dog or they could gain weight. I recommend it to everyone who has a dog without food allergies. I do not have experience with their LID (Limited Ingredient Diet) foods.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not an exact duplicate of the store brand. While this brand is good, this offering from Amazon is not the exact same product sold in Pet stores. If you are looking to save money thinking this is identical to the store brand, save your money. For some reason the width of these food bits are half of the store brand. Poor quality. Maybe they take the rejects from food processing from the good quality store brand and put them in this bag. That would explain the $20 difference in price. This is not an exact duplicate of the store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: which is good. I was happy that I bought the big ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 12 years old and he has some stomach sensitivity issues. He'd been on Purina One for awhile, but lately he started getting more and more sick, which worried me. After some research I found Natural Balance Ultra to be well reviewed, so I tried the small bag. So far, he's not gotten sick once, and he hasn't been picky about his food, so he's enjoying it. I'm really grateful I found this brand. He'll probably be on it forever since it's obviously a healthier choice for him, and I don't have to clean up dog puke, which is good. I was happy that I bought the big bag right away. Thanks for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Actually
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Actually, my dog likes it. She is an 8 year-old standard poodle, who has had intolerance of other dog foods. The "all-natural" foods like Origen and others which are high in protein and low in fiber have given her loose stools. The food that the vet recommended was high in fiber and very high in corn - not a good thing, in my view. Her stools were huge and numerous on that, as well as dry and crumbly. And we had to feed her more. With the Natural Balance she likes it, eats it, and has normal stools. The price on Amazon is better than PetCo, and with free deliver on Amazon Prime a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: just some guy

customer_reviews.title: Great food for pets - not happy with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but feel jipped by Amazon. I had purchased as subscribe and save, and not notified about price increase. Now seeing it for $47 when somehow I was charged $52 for 3 that purchased. I stopped the subscribe and save because I don’t want to pay more for item.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Both Our Dogs Are Thriving...
customer_reviews.text: Natural Balance Dog Food is great. Our Siberian Husky and our Australian Shepard love it, and it comes in several flavors. The Husky is robust and active at age 13, and has been eating this brand for YEARS! Our Shepard is going on 2 y/o and also thrives on NB Dog Food. Other than a couple of special dog treats this is the only food they get. NEVER, EVER people food.
customer_reviews.author: BeverleeC

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old Boston Terrier/Jack Russell mix and a 2 year old Boxer/American Bulldog mix who had been eating Purina Beneful (Healthy Radiance) since I have owned them. I noticed the younger dog was emitting a nasty odor through his coat and the older dog was itching all over. After doing some research I found this food highly recommended online. The difference in the foods is the ingredients. This food contains REAL meat and by-products. Though I was skeptical because it was more expensive, it was well worth it. Both dogs gobble it up and they smell normal with no skin irritation. I recommend giving it a try and see the results!
customer_reviews.author: William Lecklikner

customer_reviews.title: New formula not as good
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food our dog has had since adoption from shelter. The new formula change is not sitting as well on her stomach, as she's not as regular as she was on the previous formula. Bit of a bummer, but we won't be switching over.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwik

customer_reviews.title: Read carefull!!  Don’t buy this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this!!!! I have been feeding my dogs this since they were puppies. One is now 13 & the other is 5 & since receiving my last bag in March my dogs both have had horrible bloody diarrhea!!!! I’m not the only one! Read the prior reviews as well!! This has got to stop!! My poor babies!! Finally got their poop under control and changed from this food completely!!!!!! I expected more from this brand!!!!!! Shame on you putting my babies in danger!!!!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs food was out during the quarantine and we were being budget conscious. My dogs normally eat Natural Balance and we bought this thinking the same good brand what could go wrong? Well, my dogs (who are not sensitive) have had diarrhea for over a week. My house smells of hot garbage because of their constant farts. They are not eating anything now! My poor dogs paid the price for me wanting to save a little money. This is not worth it! Do not try it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs WANT this food
customer_reviews.text: I tried something different to make my Boxer's happy. This food delivered! They both love it...and crave for more. The color of the food is dark brown The shape of the food: little medium shaped disks. Smells pleasant for a dog food. Ingredients are premium. I will continue to purchase this brand and mix it with Science diet light. The stool resulting from this brand (in my dogs) is a bit loose and sometimes runny...that is why I mix it with a corn-based food to tighten up, and produce a less-foul smelling stool. I havent tasted this food yet, but I would eat it if i was bored Haha! Go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: I think Natural Balance simply must put in quite delicious "natural-tasting" foods in their dry mix to get this sort of wonderfu
customer_reviews.text: Our Airedale just loves this food. It's a surprise to see him so eager to dine on dry dog food, since we had earlier been feeding him rather more tasty (we thought) non-dry stuff. I think Natural Balance simply must put in quite delicious "natural-tasting" foods in their dry mix to get this sort of wonderful reaction from our 18-month old "pup". It's just great. It also ships ever sooooo quickly. Totally satisfied with our now monthly purchases!
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: ... eating blue food but the small pieces she didn't like and kept spitting them out all over the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My dog was eating blue food but the small pieces she didn't like and kept spitting them out all over the kitchen. I switched her to this dog food and she seems to really like it and I have no mess around. She took the switch well and had no problems. She's been eating it about a month. This food is much more cost-effective so I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: SmelB45

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food delivered right to your door
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding Natural Balance Original to our dog since we got him as a puppy 9 years ago. The ingredients are high quality and have kept our dog active and healthy for many years. We get many comments that our dog does not look or act like a 9 year old dog and I believe that comes from feeding a high quality food. It was great ordering this from Amazon as the price was better than my local stores and delivered right to my door. I would recommend this dog food to anyone that is researching dog food for their pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs ate the lamb flavor, but we switched to this flavor and they chow down on it. They love it! This is the Chicken and Duck flavor that they like so well.
customer_reviews.author: TJH Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: My dogs have eaten this for a while now.
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs, a Great Dane and a Welsh Terrior, both geriatric, being 12 and 13 years old respectively, seem to do nicely on this food. I feed it mixed with the venison/sweet potato canned food (same brand) along with Nupro Joint Supplement for Dogs. They have not tired of it, which they usually do fairly quickly. Both dogs get the mixture once per day and the dry food alone is available to them at all times. I love the convenience of getting it from Amazon. The heavy bags are delivered to my door, I use a hand truck to roll them into the garage. Very little heavy lifting required!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: 14 years and going strong feeding my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on this her whole life. She is and has always been very healthy. She is still very full of life and vigor. Has no rotten or even ground down teeth. Is very smart and loves to go.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: I switched to this food from Blue wilderness. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this food from Blue wilderness. The blue had too much protein and was causing smell problems at night.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Natural Balance changed the formula on the food and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Natural Balance changed the formula on the food and my dog no longer likes the taste of this food.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan H

customer_reviews.title: Good, decently priced organic dog-food
customer_reviews.text: This was the dog food that our rescue-lab was eating before she came home with us. The shelter's Vet had recommended they feed the dogs via this brand. Our Vet didn't disagree. Instead of running the risk of having her not adjust well to a different food, we decided to continue with Natural Balance. Amazon's prices were / are significantly less than what I would pay at the store. Quick delivery. I had never thought to purchase dog food on-line, but now I think I may need to see if I can have it auto-ordered every 2 months, or so.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Natural Balance Made My Dogs Healthier Immediately
customer_reviews.text: We were feeding our dog Blue Buffalo thinking we were getting high quality food for them. Our Cavalier King Charles spaniel has stomach issues so I called the vet and they said they never recommend Blue Buffalo for that reason. Too much protein that upsets their bellies. They recommended we switch to Natural Balance. Our Cavalier's stomach issues have gone away! We switched our Springer spaniel from IAMs to this too and he's lost weight and more active. What a difference dog food can make!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: The only dog food my dogs actually WANT to eat. Not that I've tasted it, but I think this is the best tasting dog food on the market. I'm about making my dogs happy, and they really do seem extremely happy on this brand of dog food. We've tried quite a few brands over the years and we have had by far, the best results with this one. For health and taste for your pups/dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Morales

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Most dog food is terrible for your pet. I used to use Beneful until I discovered what is in it (and most other store brands). Most will have corn (not digestible to dogs) and meat by product (stuff no one else will eat). Basically, garbage and filler. This is generally the cheapest brand that does not use corn or other fillers, uses real meat instead of by product, and has meat as a main ingredient. Basically, this is the cheapest dog food that is actually food, not garbage. You can buy this in the store and haul the 30 lbs bag to the car, or get it on Amazon for about the same price, dropped right to your door.
customer_reviews.author: K and B

customer_reviews.title: New formula????
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on Natural Balance for years but the most recent bag has been giving him the wettest poops. I don't know if they have recently changed their formula and/or I got a bad batch. I'm not sure whether to buy a new bag or switch to a different brand because I loved Natural Balance. Has this been happening to anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pham

customer_reviews.title: Natural balance Ultra Premium
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like paying this much for dog food but I have to be honest, I think that this is worth every penny. I have two German Shepherd's and they took right to it but we introduced it to them 50/50 the first week slowly adding more of this. They now have the most beautiful coats they've ever had. One of our dogs was a constant chewer of the feet and that has dramatically slowed if not stopped! With all of the benefits this food has to offer, I couldn't recommend a better one. I'm sure that they are out there but so is the price.
customer_reviews.author: LNH

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Came across this product by doing a bit of searching on the internet for top-rated quality dog food. This was one of the most affordable brands that offered the most nutrients for my over-weight 20 lb pup (adopted him in March). After going on this brand, he lost 7 lbs and is at a healthy 16 lbs - yay! He is a 5 yr old pomeranian mix, and I feed him a quarter of cup once a day (twice a day when we he goes on a jog). He loves this stuff. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DiegoE

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this food for your dog. I just put my dog on this last night mixing half a cup in with 1.5 cups of her other brand. She was fed the same amounts twice today and came home to diarrhea all over my house. Had to throw out to area rugs and when I put her outside to clean up she vomited all over the outdoor mat. She still has diarrhea and this is the only thing that was changed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for combatting allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies but we don’t know what to do. We have to keep him on medicine. A friend mentioned this food and since using it we were able to stop his medicine and he has been fine since. Really recommend to anyone with a dog with allergies!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Allen

customer_reviews.title: Our Pup Needs Us to Especially Monitor her Food
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is allergic to her own fat, and she has astronomical symptoms if she eats the wrong food. So we have to be careful. She has had to have Surgery, gets huge areas bubbling up and popping, looks like she has had gun shot wounds. Awful! We feel safe with this food.
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy dog food by mail, given the cost. However, this supplier shipped two huge bags for only $5.00 so how could I go wrong? They shipped to me in huge boxes. I wasn't able to immediately find this brand and variety locally and wanted to try it. My dogs loved it and it got high ratings for quality and ingredients in an independent study. Better than the usual grocery store brands I had been buying but the cost of some of the other brands put me off. If you cannot find at a reasonable price locally, I'd recommend this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Dogs and puppies can eat it and love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love natural balance. Original ultra is great because it's for puppies to adults. So I don't have to buy 2 different foods. My pup and my dog get the same thing which is great for me too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dog food you can buy for our big German ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food you can buy for our big German Shepherd mix dog. His hair color is so shiny because of what he is needed for good health ! Great for his stomach. Price this at pet store! I am saving a lot of money over time. Plus free shipping. 30lb bag last us 3 weeks. Feed him twice a day 2 cups am & 2 cups pm. This is my 2nd bag. will continue to go to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John T Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love it and I am guessing there is less filler ...
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love it and I am guessing there is less filler and more real food in it because the end product is definitely less LOL
customer_reviews.author: Northwind

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a really good dog chow. I watch ingredients and recalls very closely and this food seems to be doing things right. I have one dog that's coat can get very dry on some kibble ut he does well on Natural Balance.
customer_reviews.author: N. Autrey

customer_reviews.title: Made arthritis go away!
customer_reviews.text: We were using another brand of dog food and our 70lb mixed breed dogs had a few issues including joint pain. We had them on a few different medications recommended by the vet, but were told they were chronic conditions. After a couple months we switched to this food and within a few weeks after we started to notice the dogs looking more spry. We cut back on the medicine and they act like pups again. I would recommend this to anyone with big dogs!
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I feed Natural Balance to my Great Dane, I've always fed him the large breed bites until the price on it went up $25. So I found this and ordered it, switch him to it, and he gobbles it up, soooo....in short, he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Food, Better Poop!
customer_reviews.text: This food is GREAT! I adopted my two Pomeranians and they'd been on IAMS - pretty crummy stuff. I switched them over to this and not only do they eat less of it, but their poop is much healthier looking (firmer, not runny anymore.) Their coats are fuller and the eye gook they used to get seems to have really gone away. A friend of mine told me he feeds his dog blueberries to get rid of eye slime, so I'm wondering if this food has a similar nutrient. Really great stuff! The only thing that would be better is if you actually cooked for your dog!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: My dog is still alive so it must be good
customer_reviews.text: I put it in the bowl and he eats it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seem to like it. digestion seems to be easy on them
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this dog food for years! Our dogs have been so healthy. Our chocolate lab lived to be 16. It’s even better when it comes right to your door!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My dogs absolutely love this. If you wet it with a little water, it creates like a gravy mix, which our dogs love. It's a little pricey, but worth it compared to the junk out there
customer_reviews.author: Edward Cary

customer_reviews.title: YUMMMM - barks the dog
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs(babies) 1 border collie/Australian Shepherd mix & a Shiba Inu/Havanese mix, both very picky about their food and both very sensitive to what they eat. At first I was very skeptical about dog think.. I was the one who thought all dog food were the same. Boy was I wrong. Natural Balance is the meal that the dogs wait for and don't pick at. They love the food... and now I have to be careful not to over feed them since they inhale it like air. As a proud mom of the two, I'm happy that they're happy with their food now. Oh yeah, and now more skin irritations!
customer_reviews.author: J.G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it, that makes me happy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really enjoys this food, and it keeps her happy and healthy. The only negative is that her stools are larger than they were with the Natural Balance Limited Ingredient version of this food. But the price difference is worth it!! I also LOVE that this food is on Prime... I go to the hospital FREQUENTLY, and it is GREAT to be able to have the food delivered, wherever I am, WITHOUT doubling the cost!!! Thanks Amazon :-)
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: One of my dogs had severe reactions to so many ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs had severe reactions to so many brands of food. I tried brands from $20-$70 and nothing seemed to work for her. My vet said that she could develop pancreatitis if I kept switching her foods. Well, now I don't have to. This brand stopped all her reactions and I have not had any problems whatsoever. I also have 2 other dogs that also are doing very well on it. Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: Gini Risinger

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been on new balance since we got them 12 years. Never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Guernicax81

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to see the bites a size all could enjoy
customer_reviews.text: With numerous dogs in our home, I was happy to see the bites a size all could enjoy. And it's one of the very few that all the dogs will eagerly eat. When our vet made a home visit, she commented that this is "the good stuff!". Also, every furry tummy has been fine on this food. Were it not for the sale price, this food has been generally out of our price range.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: damn it, time to find a different dog food brand, AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I fed my dogs Natural Balance for a few years. They loved it and it helped with some food allergies and digestive issues. That is, until the NEW IMPROVED formula i bought last month. Both of my dogs have had diarrhea with the new food. I am saddened that changes have been made and that some ingredients are now being processed in China.... I'm sure that DVP would be sickened at what has been done to his dog food formulas
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Farr

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dog food that my dog has ever enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food that my dog has ever enjoyed. He comes happily when I fill his bowl and he empties it for me. I'd always buy this brand of dog food knowing that the all natural products are good for my dog...
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINESCANNELL

customer_reviews.title: Why should I have to waste paper and ink to display the same thing my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this at Petco as it was cheaper with PALS discount and a coupon, but the cashiers have told me I can't use the coupon on my phone any longer. Why should I have to waste paper and ink to display the same thing my phone can. I will have it delivered for the same price and without the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Alba

customer_reviews.title: I have used the Venison one and it was amazing! My dog's coat was nice and shinny and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this product 4 stars because I haven't used it yet. I have used the Venison one and it was amazing! My dog's coat was nice and shinny and she didn't shed as bad. This dog shed horribly and all year. When I used this brand dog food she didn't hardly shed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: That the price is outrageous.
customer_reviews.text: Doubled the price of the last time I purchased it with another vendor who is apparently not selling it anymore. Not their fault. I guess I can’t read and can’t believe it can’t be returned unopened. You live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Simmons

customer_reviews.title: English Bulldogs love it?
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 English Bulldogs were on another food that had a recall. Our dogs are 10 months, 4 years and 11 years old and all have responded well to the Natural Dog Food, Ultra Premium Formula. Their coats now look and feel great and I no longer need to have 3 different food formulas. The youngest dog had a soft stool for a few days while adjusting to this new food but all have now adjusted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Protein Dog Food for Dogs of All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dog food at a local pet store because it had much more protein and less "filler." Also, you can keep feeding it to a puppy through its adulthood. It has chicken meal, duck meal and chicken meat. fAll my dogs love it and I especially love it because it's more than $10 less on Amazon than at the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dog has been on it for seven years now, since a puppy. (Price is ok, not great.)
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Natural Balance Dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for my dogs. They like it, they are healthy and their coats look good. I do recommend it. However, food for dogs is like food for people. Not all things agree with every dog.
customer_reviews.author: Gulliver

customer_reviews.title: Win, win!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and I love having it delivered!🙂
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Less consumption, more digestable, less poop.
customer_reviews.text: Actually saves money! Pups and dog eat freely they eat less than other cheaper brands and are growing great! There is also less clean up indicating they are using what they eat and it's not just going thru their digestive tract! I have 2 five month old german shepherds that are thriving on this! Weighing in at 40 plus pounds they are shiny and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ike LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Great Wholesome Nutrition For Your Dog! Made My Boxers Fur and Poop Regular!!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who owns a boxer with the most senstive stomach in the world, this product is a welcome relief. Much Much better than blue buffalo, which uses alot of chicken meal and chicken by -product in all recipes and does not actually cater to dietary requirements. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: We are both Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have an American Bulldog with extremely sensitive skin. I have tried many different dog food brands and almost all of them have given him irritations. He enjoys this brand and has no skin issues. We are both Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love this food
customer_reviews.text: My very allergic lab mix loves this food and so far he is showing no signs of allergies to it. Usually within a week he would be itching and losing hair all over the place but it's been 3 weeks and so far so good. I have tried numerous foods some of which were ok allergy wise but I could tell he didn't like them. This is the 1st food that he truly likes to eat and isn't allergic to.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl LaRoche

customer_reviews.title: My Golden has had tummy issues since we got him ...
customer_reviews.text: My Golden has had tummy issues since we got him at 8 weeks. We originally bought the food the breeder used, then tried other premium brands. After much research we discovered this brand and have used it since. Ordering via Amazon Prime saves us about 50% from the stores. He is 2 and a half and has not had issues since we use Natural Balance food and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Riptide

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Farts from my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have two boxers and we wanted to try a different healthy dog food for them. This one was ok but it gave my pups really bad gas. and it was really bad all the time. My pups might have sensitive stomachs, but it didnt work for them. We gave it to my brothers dog who is a beagle bull dog and she seemed to like it just fine, but again it gave her bad gas too.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut Butter Jelly Time

customer_reviews.title: Been buying for years
customer_reviews.text: It's great food. The ingredients are great for dogs and my vet likes it too!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: The Best for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this food. He chomps it down and never gets tired of it. I vary a bit with raw food, baked chicken, pork, some veggies, e.g. sprinkle a few carrots or green beans for filler. But very little on veggies and not too often. His coat and skin are always healthy and glowing and his weight is steady. Nice food for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love all natural balance food :)
customer_reviews.text: I always bought the potato duck formula before but I bought this one because it was cheaper and came in a bigger package. Both dogs love it, but it causes the big dog (pit bull) a lot A LOT of gas!!! I probably wouldn't buy it again for him, but its perfect for my schnauzer, he loves it and digests it perfectly, this brand food is the only food, he scarfs right down, and it's so good for them :)
customer_reviews.author: Bham Girl

customer_reviews.title: Can Tell My Dogs Didn't Like it
customer_reviews.text: The kibble pieces are pretty big, I didn't realize that before buying it. I can tell my dogs only ate this when they were really hungry and realized it was their only option, they just grazed and didn't seem excited about meal time at all. I have switched them to Blue Buffalo because the kibble is much smaller, which they seem to prefer.
customer_reviews.author: LesDunc

customer_reviews.title: This turned my 40 lb mange infested, no hair ...
customer_reviews.text: This turned my 40 lb mange infested, no hair 6 month old adopted German Shepherd into a healthy, fur coat covered 80 lb adult.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food, our 9 year old boxer was loosing hair and we switched to this and his coat is beautiful and bald spots are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Ashli

customer_reviews.title: Dogs didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dogs really didn't like this food. I ended up having to mix it with food I know they like in order to get rid of it. It's not expired or rancid -- it just must have a different taste than they are used to. It is pretty expensive (even though it seems to have good nutrition). I would try a smaller bag next time.
customer_reviews.author: N. Verity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, healthy dog food. Love having it delivered instead of carrying it
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food on the market!
customer_reviews.text: My Shiba Inu LOVES this dog food. Eats it up so fast! Plus..I was told that this is one of the best dog foods on the market. This makes me feel good about feeding it to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: GrnEiz

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! We feed this to our English (mixed) Bulldog and Pit-bull (mix) -both love NB dry and canned foods. It is very easy on their digestive systems and they are very "regular" -we never have problems with loose stools. We're very satisfied with this product and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brackbill

customer_reviews.title: Natural Balance is a great food
customer_reviews.text: We have three small dogs. Two poodles and one shihtzu...they love this food. They are different ages and we wanted a food that would be good for all ages of dogs so we did not have to buy special food for each. This one fit the bill perfectly. Ordered and received in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, best price
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, buying our dog's food online yields the best price! Even though it's gotta be shipped, you can't beat it. Arriving right on the doorstep is pretty handy too. Our dog loves this stuff, we've been feeding it to him for over a year and he never tires of it. Seems to keep him nice and healthy too.
customer_reviews.author: John Seale

customer_reviews.title: This is puppy to adult. If your dog in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is puppy to adult. If your dog in under a certain age, i would say go buy the puppy formula
customer_reviews.author: Xiaomeng Yu

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. Been eating it for the past few years and they're both the picture of health.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jenest

customer_reviews.title: My Dog likes Natural Balance Ultra dry dog food with or without water.
customer_reviews.text: My dog (Labrador Retriever and Border Collie) over sixty pounds at 7.5 months old likes the Dick Van Patten's Natural Balance® Original Ultra® Ultra Premium Dry Food very much. He has had no problem with it mixed half with a chicken and vegetable dog food and half Natural Balance Ultra. I usually feed him with water added to the dry dog food; but not always.
customer_reviews.author: EleganzShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good Dog food
customer_reviews.text: My picky eater Service Dog loves this—moistened with a little beef broth. Heated. Spoiled? Yes, but she deserves the best food, and Natural Balance is it!
customer_reviews.author: MaryN

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it, price lower on Amazon, why lug when you have it doorstep delivered
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like this. Have two bulldogs, one has several allergies, this food seems to have helped a bit. Dogs really like this food. Shipping quick as always with prime. SO much easier to have dog food delivered to the doorstep than having to lug it home from the store. Price seems much much less than the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: sheebes

customer_reviews.title: My Dog absolutely Loves this Food! This dog food ...
customer_reviews.text: My Dog absolutely Loves this Food! This dog food has many natural, healthy ingredients & is full of protein. It doesn't sit in the bowl for more than 30 seconds before my dog gobbles it up, compared to the cheaper dog foods I have used in the past. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam12k

customer_reviews.title: My dog enjoys this food
customer_reviews.text: I have a german shepherd dog and he really likes this food. He has a shiny coat and is very healthy. I have found though that towards the end of the bag that he isnt as enthusiastic. I am wondering if it goes a bit stale. I do keep it in an airtight container. I will probably have to get smaller bags more often.
customer_reviews.author: Hungry Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Nine week old puppy...
customer_reviews.text: I've had him on this food since he was seven weeks old and he is responding wonderful to it. His stool is solid. His energy levels are extremely high. He looks healthy in every way. His coat is beautiful. He also loves the way it tastes. I don't add anything to it. My puppy is a chocolate lab.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Crushed food particulate and smaller pieces a big disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand for our dog before with no issues. However, the last batch I bought seemed to have slightly smaller pieces of food than usual and the bag was filled with crushed food particulate (from the top of the bag through to the bottom) that you would typically only encounter when you get to the bottom of the bag. Very disappointed with the quality of this last bag I purchased. Considering a switch to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usualy ok but last bag was bad
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! We have ordered this from Amazon for over a year and something isn't right with the last bag - our pup threw up after eating it and won't go near it now - it also has a funny smell. Probably just a one-off, but sucks when it happens to your pup.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Colbrese

customer_reviews.title: All is good here..
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 mo. Boston Terrier loves it. She still suffers a bit from dandruff, but she hasnt vomited like she was while eating a prescription brand. That was scary! Thanks for providing a quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Internoscia

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. Natural Balance Original Ultra dog food is a well balanced quality kibble that keeps my dogs in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bischoff

customer_reviews.title: Dogs hated it
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered and looked as promised but our dogs hated it. Too bad because the nutrition ratings were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: Not that I can vouch for the taste or anything, but my dog likes it and eats it. He looks pretty healthy so looks like it's everything I ever wanted it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Lee

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a long time. My vet suggested it because the coat of a rescued pup was in rough shape. Her coat came back beautifully. I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs
customer_reviews.text: Say a big NO to this product. Farts and gas abounded for a week... I tried to give it some time and let the dogs get acclimated to it. But no go. Moved over to the Costco grain free food and the gas issues went away. Too bad, this looked like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Endorsed by adorable rescue dog!! (and her owner)
customer_reviews.text: This dog food get consistent high ratings for quality ingredients and optimum nutrition. I was thrilled to find it on Amazon for a better price than my local store and ease of shopping (free delivery----yeah!). It can't get any easier than this to take great care of my dog.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Sadly my pup doesn't seem to like this "flavor" nearly as much as some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my 9 pound 8 month old Havanese pup doesn't seem to like this "flavor" nearly as much as some of the samples she's tasted with duck and fish in them. She continues to be hungry but will walk away from a full bowl. Meanwhile she is ready to do tricks to earn some of the duck or fish variety. Ordering and delivery were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Smith

customer_reviews.title: My chow chow won't eat this food.
customer_reviews.text: My chow has eaten Natural Balance Original Formula his entire life and he is 10 years old. I opened the new bag and my dog will not eat it. I got a refund from Amazon. Thank you Amazon. Now I need to find a new dog food.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH

customer_reviews.title: Product as stated. Image not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Natural Balance is a great brand, my dachshunds love it. The title of the product and the associated image do not match though. Especially since there is another review that states they received a 33lb of dog food. At Petco, I never even seen a 30lb bag. Be aware that the image is misleading. You will only receive the stated 30lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: DELovett

customer_reviews.title: Natural Balance Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched our pooch from Beneful and Purina dog foods to Natural Balance. After I had read about what the ingredients in these Beneful and other Purina products were doing to pets. This is one of the few recommended & highly rated dog/cat foods that I found. I made the switch and my dog and cat both love the new food. I am a happy pet owner. Even better, Amazon delivers the food right to my door. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauretta Dagg

customer_reviews.title: hard to find in stores........
customer_reviews.text: One of the best nutritional dog foods that you can provide for your dog. My pup and 9 year old mixed breed love it after switching from problematic beneful.
customer_reviews.author: MYTTHUNDER

product_meta.title: Natural Balance Original Ultra Grain Free Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken, Chicken Meal & Duck Meal| Size:30 Lb. BagOriginal Ultra Whole Body Health nourishes your dog's complete well-being by taking an entire body approach. This diet is an optimal balance of premium proteins and key nutrients created by our expert nutritionists. Supports Hip and Joint Health. Original Ultra Whole Body Health supports the needs of your dog through all life stages, from your growing puppy to your ever-energetic adult dog. So delicious and healthy, your dog will never bark for anything else!
feature_bullets: Contains one 30 pound bag of dry dog food
Supports neural development.Calorie content:3,590 kcal/kg; 410 kcal/8 oz cup
Supports strong, growing heart, eyes, bones & teeth
